author: smuzaffar
body: We now have a new https://github.com/cms-data/Validation-HGCalValidation to integrate HGcal validation geometry data. I already have moved these deleted files in the cms-data repo ( https://github.com/cms-data/Validation-HGCalValidation/pull/1 ). So there is no need to keep these files in cmssw. This can be integrated once CMSSW_12_0_X_2021-06-10-2300 is available.
title: move Validation/HGCalValidation/data files to cms-data repo
